Instrument.name: Apollo 15 Cold Cathode Ion Gage Experiment
Instrument.description: Apollo 15 Cold Cathode Ion Gage (CCIG) experiment measured the density of neutral particles to determine the amount of gas present at the lunar surface and to help help constrain the source and loss mechanisms of the tenuous lunar atmosphere.
